title: MINUTE
description: Extracts the minute (0–59) from a Datetime value, based on the context user’s local time zone.

parameters.name: datetime
parameters.description: The Datetime value from which the minute is extracted.

examples:
MINUTE(NOW())
-- Returns 55 (if now = 2024-09-18T15:25:22.418Z and user is in UTC+5:30).
